name: Nudge Nudge
description:
This is my entry for the Winter 2018 My First Game Jam.

I've always loved Sokoban and Adventures of Lolo and wanted to make something in that vein. 

As with I'm sure every game jam, I didn't have enough time to devote to do everything I wanted to get done in the game. Music, in particular, is something I would have liked to spend more time on. More levels and better level designs would have been great as well. Oh well, such is life!
